languages.text: "Вам, Версериан, не приходило в голову, что есть вещи выше выгод династии? Торжество закона Императора и неотвратимость правосудия, например".

traits.locale_text: "Вам, Версериан, не приходило в голову, что есть вещи выше выгод династии? Торжество закона Императора и неотвратимость правосудия, например".

languages.text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."
languages.original_text: "Вам, Версериан, не приходило в голову, что есть вещи выше выгод династии? Торжество закона Императора и неотвратимость правосудия, например".

traits.locale_text: "Have you never considered that there are things more important than the dynasty's welfare, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's law and the inevitability of justice, to name a few."

"Have you never considered that there are things more important than the dynasty's welfare, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's law and the inevitability of justice, to name a few."
"Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."
"Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."
"Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."
"Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン。王朝の繁栄よりも大切なものがあるということを、お前は考えたことがないのか？たとえば、皇帝陛下の法の栄光や、正義の不可避といったものを」
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン。王朝の繁栄よりも大切なものがあるということを、お前は考えたことがないのか？たとえば、皇帝陛下の法の栄光や、正義の不可避といったものを」

languages.text: "Ist Euch nie der Gedanke gekommen, dass manche Dinge wichtiger sind als der Reichtum der Dynastie, Werserian?" Dinge wie der Triumph des Gesetzes des Imperators und die Unausweichlichkeit der Gerechtigkeit, um nur zwei zu nennen."
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: "Ist Euch nie der Gedanke gekommen, dass manche Dinge wichtiger sind als der Reichtum der Dynastie, Werserian?" Dinge wie der Triumph des Gesetzes des Imperators und die Unausweichlichkeit der Gerechtigkeit, um nur zwei zu nennen."

languages.text: « Ne vous est-il jamais venu à l'esprit qu'il existe des choses plus importantes que la prospérité de la dynastie, Werserian ? Des choses comme le triomphe de la loi de l'Empereur et l'inéluctabilité de la justice, pour n'en citer que deux. »
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous est-il jamais venu à l'esprit qu'il existe des choses plus importantes que la prospérité de la dynastie, Werserian ? Des choses comme le triomphe de la loi de l'Empereur et l'inéluctabilité de la justice, pour n'en citer que deux. »

« Ne vous est-il jamais venu à l'esprit qu'il existe des choses plus importantes que la prospérité de la dynastie, Werserian ? Des choses comme le triomphe de la loi de l'Empereur et l'inéluctabilité de la justice, pour n'en citer que deux. »

languages.text: «¿Nunca le ha dado por pensar que hay cosas más importantes que la prosperidad de la dinastía, Werserian? Cosas como el triunfo de la ley del Emperador y la inevitabilidad de la justicia, por nombrar dos de ellas».
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: «¿Nunca le ha dado por pensar que hay cosas más importantes que la prosperidad de la dinastía, Werserian? Cosas como el triunfo de la ley del Emperador y la inevitabilidad de la justicia, por nombrar dos de ellas».

languages.text: “有些事情比王朝的繁荣更重要吗，这些事情你就没想过吗，韦尔森总领？举两个例子，比如终将胜利的帝皇律法，以及无从逃避的正义。”
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: “有些事情比王朝的繁荣更重要吗，这些事情你就没想过吗，韦尔森总领？举两个例子，比如终将胜利的帝皇律法，以及无从逃避的正义。”

languages.text: "Bazı şeylerin hanedanlığın refahından daha önemli olabileceği ihtimalini hiç düşündün mü Werserian? İmparator'un Yasası'nın üstünlüğü ya da adaletin kaçınılmazlığı mesela..."
languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı şeylerin hanedanlığın refahından daha önemli olabileceği ihtimalini hiç düşündün mü Werserian? İmparator'un Yasası'nın üstünlüğü ya da adaletin kaçınılmazlığı mesela..."
"Bazı şeylerin hanedanlığın refahından daha önemli olabileceği ihtimalini hiç düşündün mü Werserian? İmparator'un kanunlarının üstünlüğü ya da adaletin kaçınılmazlığı mesela?"

languages.original_text: "Have you never considered that some things are more important than the dynasty prospering, Werserian? Things such as the triumph of the Emperor's Law and the inevitability of justice, to name two."
